0.0.1: Fixed changelog list UI not scrolling (overflow)
Changed background color of logo to orange
0.0.2: Fixed reverse list order in changelogs tab
Added fix for potential future error location (mod icon)
Fixed bug where versions tab contents are created multiple times
Fixed changelog scroll at bottom bug
Added lower opacity mod entries for mods that don't support your PML version
0.1.0: Updated mod to support PolyTrack version 0.5.1
0.1.1: Fixed non updated mod icons not loading
Fixed reverse list order in changelogs tab
Fixed bug where versions tab contents are created multiple times
Fixed changelog scroll at bottom bug
Added lower opacity mod entries for mods that don't support your PML version
0.1.5: Updated mod to support PolyTrack version 0.5.2
0.1.6: Version fetching in parallel implemented for faster loading
Dependencies auto installed when found within PolyLibrary
One mod version for all game versions

shortdesc: A mod which allows you to see a library of other PolyModLoader mods along with additional info such as changelog and version info.
